summary: AUDIENCE when I did this little series, the title AUDIENCE just popped into my head i didn’t know exactly why but it seemed to...
caption:
AUDIENCE

when I did this little series, the title AUDIENCE just popped into my head
i didn’t know exactly why but it seemed to fit
then a caption came to my head too: “judge much?”
so then it made sense, i realized they all looked like different expressions of spectators judging what they were watching
it’s interesting how the “being seen” or “wanting to be seen” becomes overwhelming in a way in this era of digital sharing, because even though no one is watching, the whole world potentially is
how does one handle that?

if you fancy these artworks please consider checking out my Etsy store :D it’s a cool way to get your hands on some affordable downloadable art and support the artist!
https://www.etsy.com/es/shop/LaPretenciosa

oh and thanks for stopping by ^^

summary: Thank You Title says it all.  This piece took me far longer than I wanted but I finished it none the less!   Without the three...
caption:
Thank You

Title says it all.  This piece took me far longer than I wanted but I finished it none the less!   Without the three characters featured in the top corner I wouldn’t have gone on to create the five you see at the bottom as I wouldn’t have ever bothered picking up a pencil.

blog.name: dreamyartistart
blog.title: My passion, my world...
blog.description:
Hello! Dreamy here! Welcome to my Art Blog!
Here, you can found all kind of my drawing like doodles, WIP, sketches (a lot of them) and more. I draw random fandoms and OC's.

WARNING: This blog can contain Spoilers from different fandoms, slightly NSFW (violence and gore, nudity, horror body, swearing, angst...), SFW Giant/tiny and a lil' bit of self-insert.
So, you've been warned…

Fandoms: SEGA (Sonic The Hedgehog and Ristar The Shooting Star), Nintendo (Super Mario Bros. and Pokemon), Spyro The Dragon, Guilty Gear, Street Fighter, Shovel Knight, Undertale, Bendy and The Ink Machine, Cuphead, Deltarune.

summary:
That's it! I give up! X(
Some of my art and sketches I posted don't appeared in the tag! So i post over and over again to be...
body:
That’s it! I give up! X(

Some of my art and sketches I posted don’t appeared in the tag! So i post over and over again to be sure their are here but nah, nothing…

This is why i don’t get some likes and reblog recently (except from my followers). This is hard to get notice if the tag system doesn’t workS correctly (specially if you comeback in a old fandom or go to a new fandom… o~o; )

Sorry if yoy see sometimes three time of the same drawing but… It’s annoying…

summary:
Mint!!
Its my first time using watercolors so there’s a ton of mistakes and i still don’t know how to mix the colors I want so I...
body:
Mint!!


Its my first time using watercolors so there’s a ton of mistakes and i still don’t know how to mix the colors I want so I made adjustments on procreate, now I don’t have an iPad Pro or pencil so I made all the things with my finger…. I need to start saving up 😓


Anyway! I love drawing horned ladies and all improving tips are appreciated!

tags: also it's almost midnight here and i can't see shit so i apologize if i mispelled something
summary: Being a small artist on tumblr
title: Being a small artist on tumblr
body:
You know, i never rant on here because i hate it, but there’s always a first time for everything, i guess.

I’ll be honest with you. I really don’t know why i still upload my art here. Because, let’s get real : nobody cares. Only a small portion of my friends/followers do. (and i’m very thankful but that’s not the point)

Like, it isn’t spectacular or inspiring in any way. It’s nice to look at and probably looks clean, i don’t know. But i still make progress and i’m still proud of what i can do, so, it’s great !!

… Well, it would be great if i wasn’t the only one to feel that way. 

Don’t get me wrong, i’m not begging for attention or notes or whatever. It’s just that i’m frustrated seeing how many hours and hours of work, blood and sweat i waste on a piece of art to see it getting 5 likes at the end of the day.
It wouldn’t be so frustrating if it wasn’t that inconsistent either. Let’s take an exemple : you draw something quick in a hour or so of something popular and BAM 2000+ notes ! But when you take 5+ hours to draw a piece, you’re very proud of it, you post it and then you see that you have 6 notes. The difference here is… Quite impressive.

And you know what’s the worst ? Trying to sell commissions here on Tumblr.
If you’re not a popular artist then you’re screwed my dude. Because nobody will care enough and take the time to reblog the commission page that you posted. How are small artists supposed to make a living you ask ? They don’t.

I just… Don’t really know how to conclude this thing but i see it happening everywhere around me and it saddens me to see so many small artists struggling to get their work recognized, and i’m not only speaking for myself here.

blog.name: autonomy1
blog.title: Peter Percival-AUTONOMY
blog.description: Shades, nuances, scraps of existence......looking directly at an object can sometimes be a meaningless, even a destructive use of time…in society we are trained to look at things quickly, process that information and move on to another view…so much information and meaning can be lost in the action of moving on….by changing the expected angle of view, or re-arranging elements of an image one can derive another meaning from it, and if not an absolute meaning an abstract one which makes us look once again…that is all one can ask for, another look…(©) Pete Percival - 2013 All Rights Reserved. Reproduction of any kind is illegal.
